Package org.spongepowered.api.event

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Cancellable
    Represents an event that can be cancelled.
    Event
    An event that occurs in Sponge.
    EventHandler<T extends Event>
    Represents a handler accepting events of a specified type.
    ExperienceEvent
    An event that is related to experience.
    GameEvent
    An event that deals with the game.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractEvent
    An abstract event that can be extended for any and all custom events as necessary.
    SpongeEventFactory
    Generates Sponge event implementations.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Order
    Order that Subscribed methods may be registered at.
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    Subscribe
    Used to annotate a method as an EventHandler.
